item.title: About the Project
item.description: The Archives Unleashed Project Archives Unleashed aims to make petabytes of historical internet content accessible to scholars and others interested in researching the recent past. Supported by a grant from the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation, we will be developing web archive search and data analysis tools to enable scholars and librarians to access, share, and investigate recent history since the early days of the World Wide Web. Growing out of a series of datathons held at the University of Toronto, Library of Congress, Internet Archive, and the British Library, our team recognized the need for better analytics tools, community infrastructure, and accessible web archival interfaces.

item.title: Get Involved
item.description: Hello world Let’s create our first content file for your documentation. Open a terminal and add the following command for each new file you want to add. Replace <section-name> with a general term that describes your document in detail. hugo new <section-name>/filename.md Visitors of your website will find the final document under www.example.com/<section-name>/filename/. Since it’s possible to have multiple content files in the same section I recommend to create at least one index.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: Quo vadis? The port of the original Material theme has replicated nearly all of its features. A few are still missing but I’ve good news: the Hugo community is actively working on this issues. Maybe with the next release of Hugo we can abandon this list. Stay tuned. Localization Currently, it is possible to collect all strings in a single place for easy customization. However, this only enables you to define all strings in a single language.

item.title: Archives Unleashed Project
item.description: Archives Unleashed Project Date Content 13 January 2018 CFP Released 20 February 2018 CFP Second Call 20 March 2018 Rich and Famous Material is a theme for Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. It is built using Google’s material design guidelines, fully responsive, optimized for touch and pointer devices as well as all sorts of screen sizes.
